name: ClothoAQA
description: Audio question answering benchmark built on Clotho captions with binary and open-ended questions.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Binary classification accuracy for yes/no questions

test_method: Use the official train/validation/test splits. Evaluate binary accuracy or F1 depending on question type.
notes: Report handling of open-ended questions and whether additional captioning outputs were leveraged.
